about_the_game:
A fan game that's easy to enjoy!

With the simple gameplay of shooting and hitting in a pinball game,

there’s no need to understand complicated rules!

Shoot freely wherever you like and clear the game together with the talents.

The content of the broadcasts is related to the talents' activities,

so if you understand all the references, you might be a model fan of the talents...!?

Let's liven up the broadcasts and increase the number of subscribers!

The broadcast gets more exciting as listeners empathize with the talents' actions!

As the broadcast becomes more lively, the number of concurrent viewers, likes, and comments will increase,

and you’ll clear the broadcast when you connect with all the listeners!

The number of new channel subscribers will increase as the broadcast becomes more exciting.

Various elements to liven up the broadcast:

Each talent has unique action skills,

so try using them at the right moment!

Successfully using these skills allows you to connect with more listeners,

bringing you closer to a successful broadcast!

There are also special skills that can only be used in special broadcasts, so don't miss out!

High-rating gimmicks placed in each stage

will increase likes when hit, so aim for them actively!

Other gimmicks are also hidden, so use them for a successful broadcast.

Aim for the high score!

You can earn more points by connecting with many listeners in a single action

or by clearing the broadcast with fewer actions.

Predict the placement of listeners and the bounce of actions,

and utilize action skills and gimmicks to aim for the high score!

The ranking ended on December 5, 2024! Thank you to everyone who participated in the challenge!
